content: introducing the rustic tea cozy pattern this tea cozy is a soft farmhouse style cozy to keep your tea warm on any day of the year the colours are inspired by nature and they make it perfect for your cottage core or farmhouse style home décor it is made with the simple half_double_crochet stitch and so it is also a beginner friendly project it is made from two panels sewn together to create the spaces for the handle and spout there are instructions for the flower topper as well there is a video tutorial on my youtube channel 1 demonstrating how to make this tea cozy 1 https //youtu be/qv-hysgaglw
